text: Imperial College Healthcare NHS Trust is an NHS trust based in London. It works closely with Imperial College London. It started in 2007. It rune five hospitals: Charing Cross Hospital; Hammersmith Hospital; Queen Charlotte's and Chelsea Hospital; St Mary's Hospital and Western Eye Hospital. In 2019/20 it had a turnover of Â£1.3 billion. It employed about 13,000 people and treated about 1.3 million people. == References == Category:NHS trusts Category:Organisations based in London Category:Imperial College London
title: Imperial College Healthcare Trust
